ui:msg.description: This website helps students to learn with others across the globe.

div.ui:msg: This website helps students to learn with others across the globe.

ui:msg.description: LinguaeLive helps instructors find and link with instructors and their classes whose skills and needs complement theirs. The Course Codes allow instructors oversight of student registration.

div.ui:msg: LinguaeLivehelps instructors find and link with instructors and their classes whose skills and needs complement theirs. The Course Codes allow instructors oversight of student registration.

ui:msg.description: LinguaeLive helps students in linked classes find complementary partners. They can communicate using any method, such as VOIP or Chat.

div.ui:msg: LinguaeLive helps students in linked classes find complementary partners. They can communicate using any method, such as VOIP or Chat.

ui:msg.description: LinguaeLive helps document the amount of time that students communicated with its timing function, which is handy for grading.

div.ui:msg: LinguaeLive helps document the amount of time that students communicated with its timing function, which is handy for grading.
